content: 1-2-3 baby afghan crochet provided by beverly johnson materials 4 skeins of ella rae cozy soft prints 213 yards/100 grams size i crochet hook finished size approximately 31 x 28 multiple of 4 chain on 132 row 1 3 double_crochet in the 4th chain from hook *skip 3 sts 1 single_crochet in next chain ch2 3 double_crochet in same chain as single_crochet repeat from * ending with 1 single_crochet in the last chain ch3 turn row 2 3 double_crochet in 1st single_crochet of previous row then *in the chain 2 space of previous row work single_crochet ch2 3 double_crochet repeat from * ending with single_crochet in the ch3 of previous row ch3 turn repeat row 2 until desired length mosaic yarn studio 109 w prospect ave mount prospect il 60056 www mosaicyarnstudio com 847-390-1013
